mapper.select: SELECT FAQNO, FAQCATEGORY, FAQTITLE, FAQCONTENT, FAQREGDATE, FAQMODDATE, FAQDELFLAG FROM teampj.FAQ ORDER BY FAQNO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT teampj.seq_FAQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO teampj.FAQ
VALUES (#{faqno}, #{faqcategory}, #{faqtitle}, #{faqcontent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE teampj.FAQ SET FAQCATEGORY = #{faqcategory}, FAQTITLE = #{faqtitle}, FAQCONTENT = #{faqcontent}, FAQMODDATE = DEFAULT WHERE FAQNO = #{faqno}
